body_html:
To give the default parameter type functionality could I use function overloading? i.e.

Create to instances of randint in Tensorfactories.cpp and yaml file, one which takes 2 arguments and other taking three arguments because keeping to default parameter would make the code confusing.
Otherwise I will make the second and third parameter (high and sizes) of randint function as NULL and proceed similar to numpy.

body:
To give the default parameter type functionality could I use function overloading? i.e. 

Create to instances of randint in Tensorfactories.cpp and yaml file, one which takes 2 arguments and other taking three arguments because keeping to default parameter would make the code confusing.
Otherwise I will make the second and third parameter (high and sizes) of randint function as NULL and proceed similar to numpy.
